pr_title: SQL: [Tests] Add tests for optimization of aliased expressions

timeline.message:
SQL: [Tests] Add tests for optimization of aliased expressions

Add a unit test to verify that the optimization of expression
(e.g. COALESCE) is applied to all instances of the expression:
SELECT, WHERE, GROUP BY.

Relates to #35270

timeline.bodyText: Aggs does not expose its internal state - I would use instead the asAggBuilder() and its string to do the test matching.
timeline.author: costin
